text: Juan de Dios Salas (c.1760-c.1830) was a Spanish priest of the order of Saint John of God, who served as an emissary of the Holy Office in Buenos Aires, Bogotá, Lima and Santiago. He took an active part in the establishment of religious hospital orders in Spain and South America. == References == Category:1760s births Category:1830s deaths Category:People from Lima Category:People from Buenos Aires Category:People from Bogotá Category:Brothers Hospitallers of Saint John of God Order Category:Spanish colonial governors and administrators
title: Juan de Dios Salas
